                <div id="low-manage" class="">
                    <div class="curved container">
                        <h3>Managing Tomcat</h3>
                        <p>For security, access to the <a href="/manager/html">manager webapp</a> is restricted.
                        Users are defined in:</p>
                        <pre>$CATALINA_HOME/conf/tomcat-users.xml</pre>
                        <p>In Tomcat 9.0 access to the manager application is split between
                           different users. &nbsp; <a href="/docs/manager-howto.html">Read more...</a></p>
                        <br />

      let currentIndex = null;

      const showAddFormButton = $("#showAddForm");
      const addBookModal = new bootstrap.Modal(
        document.getElementById("addBookModal")
      );
      const modalTitle = $("#addBookModalLabel");
      const numberInput = $("#number");

      // Show Add Form Modal
      showAddFormButton.on("click", () => {
        modalTitle.text("æ·»åŠ å›¾ä¹¦");
        numberInput.prop("disabled", false); // Enable the number input field
        $("#bookForm")[0].reset(); // Clear the form fields
        addBookModal.show();
      });

      // Add Book
      $("#bookForm").on("submit", function (event) {
        event.preventDefault();
        const number = $("#number").val();
        const name = $("#name").val();
        const author = $("#author").val();

        const bookData = { number, name, author };

        if (currentIndex === null) {
          $.ajax({
            url: `xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx`,
            method: "GET",
            success: function (response) {
              renderBooks();
              addBookModal.hide(); // Hide modal after submission
            },
            error: function (error) {
              console.error("Error adding book:", error);
            },
          });
        } else {
          // Update existing book
          $.ajax({
            url: `xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx`,
            method: "GET",
            success: function (response) {
              currentIndex = null;
              renderBooks();
              addBookModal.hide(); // Hide modal after submission
            },
            error: function (error) {
              console.error("Error updating book:", error);
            },
          });
        }

        this.reset();
      });

      // Render Book List
      function renderBooks() {
        $.ajax({
          url: "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx",
          method: "GET",
          success: function (data) {
            console.log("data: ", data);
            const bookList = $("#bookList");
            bookList.empty();
            data.forEach((book, index) => {
              console.log(typeof book.number);
              const row = $(`
                <tr>
                  <td>${book.number}</td>
                  <td>${book.name}</td>
                  <td>${book.author}</td>
                  <td>
                    <div class="btn-group" id='btn-group_${book.number}'>
                      <button class="btn btn-info btn-sm" onclick="viewBook('${book.number}')">æŸ¥çœ‹</button>
                      <button class="btn btn-warning btn-sm" onclick="editBook(${index}, '${book.number}')">ç¼–è¾‘</button>
                      <button class="btn btn-danger btn-sm" onclick="deleteBook('${book.number}')">åˆ é™¤</button>
                    </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
              `);
              bookList.append(row);
            });
          },
          error: function (error) {
            console.error("Error fetching books:", error);
          },
        });
      }

      // View Book
      function viewBook(number) {
        $.ajax({
          url: `xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx`,
          method: "GET",
          success: function (book) {
            alert(`ä¹¦å: ${book.name}\nä½œè€…: ${book.author}`);
          },
          error: function (error) {
            console.error("Error viewing book:", error);
          },
        });
      }

      // Edit Book
      function editBook(index, number) {
        const numberStr = number.toString();
        $.ajax({
          url: `xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx`,
          method: "GET",
          success: function (book) {
            $("#number").val(book.number);
            $("#name").val(book.name);
            $("#author").val(book.author);
            currentIndex = index;
            modalTitle.text("ç¼–è¾‘å›¾ä¹¦");
            numberInput.prop("disabled", true); // Disable the number input field
            addBookModal.show();
          },
          error: function (error) {
            console.error("Error fetching book for edit:", error);
          },
        });
      }

      // Delete Book
      function deleteBook(number) {
        console.log("deleteBook:", number);
        console.log(typeof number);
        if (confirm("ç¡®å®šè¦åˆ é™¤è¿™æœ¬ä¹¦å—ï¼Ÿ")) {
          $.ajax({

            success: function (response) {

# ============================================
# ç³»ç»Ÿç›‘æ§è„šæœ¬
# è·å– CPU å’Œå†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡å¹¶å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åº“
# ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•: bash monitor.sh
# ============================================

# æ•°æ®åº“é…ç½®
DB_HOST="localhost"
DB_USER="root"
DB_PASS="1qaz@WSX#EDC"
DB_NAME="linux_exam"

# è·å– CPU ä½¿ç”¨ç‡
# ä½¿ç”¨ top å‘½ä»¤è·å– CPU ç©ºé—²ç‡ï¼Œç„¶åè®¡ç®—ä½¿ç”¨ç‡
CPU_IDLE=$(top -bn1 | grep "Cpu(s)" | awk '{print $8}' | sed 's/%//g')
if [ -z "$CPU_IDLE" ]; then
    # å¤‡ç”¨æ–¹æ³•
    CPU_IDLE=$(vmstat 1 2 | tail -1 | awk '{print $15}')
fi
CPU_PERCENT=$(echo "scale=2; 100 - $CPU_IDLE" | bc)

# è·å–å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡
MEM_INFO=$(free | grep Mem)
MEM_TOTAL=$(echo $MEM_INFO | awk '{print $2}')
MEM_USED=$(echo $MEM_INFO | awk '{print $3}')
MEM_PERCENT=$(echo "scale=2; $MEM_USED * 100 / $MEM_TOTAL" | bc)

# è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')

# è¾“å‡ºç›‘æ§æ•°æ®
echo "=== ç³»ç»Ÿç›‘æ§æ•°æ® ==="
echo "æ—¶é—´: $TIMESTAMP"
echo "CPU ä½¿ç”¨ç‡: $CPU_PERCENT%"
echo "å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡: $MEM_PERCENT%"

# æ’å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“
SQL="INSERT INTO t_system_stats (cpu_percent, mem_percent, timestamp) VALUES ($CPU_PERCENT, $MEM_PERCENT, '$TIMESTAMP')"

mysql -h "$DB_HOST" -u "$DB_USER" -p"$DB_PASS" "$DB_NAME" -e "$SQL"

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "æ•°æ®å·²å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åº“"
else
    echo "æ•°æ®åº“å†™å…¥å¤±è´¥"
    exit 1
fi
